column5: Went out with Bojan (Jangles) and Rob for some steelhead. we ended up doing pretty good considering the conditions of the rivers and the freezing weather. Heres the Action Shot    FISH ONNNNNNN  And Jangles with a nice Bow  Sorry not to many pics, way to cold
Ahahahaha, love the background shot in the second pic.  Great!!!  Joey
What river were you fishing?... if you dont mind me asking, and did you catch or buy the fish?? lol
I just knew there were fish near Sobeys....damn....and here I put my rod and reel away for the winter....LOL.  Great photoshop job!
i know which Sobeye's u guys drifted.  Must of had more then usual elbow room today.  Too bad i had lunch plans i would of loved to reach.  nice pics

Hey!!! I went to Sobey's after seeing this post and they got all pissed off when I threw a line in their Trout display.      Jeez...I showed them the pic posted in this thread and they told me his must have been a division 8 fish and apparently, their fish came from division 6.  To make matters worse, a CO was shopping and I was charged, lost my fishing license and now cant fish or shop in Sobeys for a year.  I'll be trying the A&P across town later today, but I'll bring my 4 year daughter to distract shoppers and employees....I'm wanna catch my first trout by the new year!!!  I know it's bad to ask about locations, but which Sobeys were you fishing at?  PM me if you wish.
Great, post that report with pics and every lurker will be hitting that Sobeys by tomorrow!  You might as well have posted the GPS coordinates...    Mike
WTG FishFinder...... I know there in there.... What were you using for bait..and if roe, what colour size???? Thanks for the pics bud!
way to go man nothing like cathing that fall chrome. congrats. love that photoshop work of a pic. cheers and great fishing.
Nice fish and nice backround i think i know where that spot is. hahahah lol    jordan
